name: Mayhem Heroes
description:
Mayhem Heroes is a frenetic beat'em up where you have to take down as many enemies as possible and, ideally, be the last one standing. Use punches, kicks, special moves and power ups to send your opponents flying out of the arena! Play with up to 4 friends (locally or via remote play together) and show them who's the boss!



With a wide variety of attacks, supers and power ups you will be able to finish off your enemies in style, just like in Hollywood action movies! Each hero also has his signature move, for even more power and aggression.

Play versus or co-op in multiple game modes

Go wild in "More Kills" versus mode, play strategically in "Last Man Standing" versus mode, or take on a horde of furious enemies in "Survival" co-op mode.

Heroes with unique attributes and attributes

Each hero has its strengths and weaknesses and it's up to you to master them. Make the best choice according to your fighting style and game mode.

Dynamic arenas

As if the enemies weren't enough, in each arena you'll also have a challenge to face, from angry skeletons, to earthquakes and mages that cast meteors.

Anyone can play, but mastering is for the strong!

Despite the really simple mechanics that anyone can play, it is necessary to have a strategy to survive the attacks of the enemies and also the obstacles and challenges of each arena. Be smart and always have a strategy in mind, because the tables can turn at any time!

Better with friends

Nothing like laughing in your friends' faces, right? All game modes in Mayhem Heroes (versus or coop) supports 1-4 players. Play with your friends on the couch or online via Remote Play Together (joysticks required for other players)

Tons of tutorials for you to become ace
More than 30 tutorials for you to learn from the controls to how to master the game modes and take advantage of the heroes' attributes, special moves and power ups
